commodities.dataaccess.database
Class DBConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
  com.util.ObjectPool
      commodities.dataaccess.database.DBConnectionPool
public class DBConnectionPool
extends ObjectPool

DBConnectionPool maintains a pool of connections to a database. A properties file keyed in the properties manager by the name of 'database' should appear in the execution directory. If the file does not appear or does not contain the needed properties, default properties will be used instead. The following properties and their defaults are used: database.jdbcdriver jdbc:odbc:LocalServer database.url sun.jdbc.odbc.JdbcOdbcDriver database.username database.password

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11
